attributes.action: Ban the London Fireworks New Year Display from use of political messages.
attributes.background: Each year London puts on a new year display on the London eye to welcome in the New Year. This is a showcase to the world and hopefully a time that as a nation we unite as we go towards what we all hope is a better future. It is not a time for political messages on issues dividing the nation.

rejection.details: The UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for the new year's eve fireworks display in London.
